participant_1.background: I'm a student. I'm from California. I like to shop at Goodwill. I think recycling is important. I like to be outdoors.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Passionate about music, loves the color black, and enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: I drive a black car. I have a black purse. I like rock music. My favorite artist is Guns N' Roses. I like to wear black.

content.text: Hi, I'm (username). I'm a student from California. I like to shop at Goodwill, think recycling is important, and love to be outdoors.
Hi (username), I'm (username). I drive a black car, have a black purse, like rock music, my favorite artist is Guns N' Roses, and I like to wear black.
That's interesting, I also like rock music! What are some of your favorite bands?
I love Guns N' Roses, Metallica, AC/DC, and The Rolling Stones.
Oh, nice! I love all those bands too!
What about you? Where are you from?
I'm from California too! I'm a student at UCLA.
Oh, that's cool! I'm from the Bay Area.
Oh, cool! I've always wanted to visit the Bay Area.
You should come! It's a beautiful place.
I definitely will! Do you have any favorite places to visit in the Bay Area?
I love going to the beach. I also love going to the mountains.
That sounds nice. I love the beach too.
What's your favorite thing to do in California?
I love going to concerts. I also love going to the beach.
Me too! I love going to concerts and the beach.
It sounds like we have a lot in common!
Yeah, we do! It's nice to meet you, (username).
